Statute.Title: Marketing Freedom for Grain Farmers Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Libre choix des producteurs de grains en matière de commercialisation, Loi sur le)

Minister.Text: Minister of Agriculture and Agri-Food and Minister for the Canadian Wheat Board

CIF.Text: CIF, 2011, c. 25, s. 1, Parts 1, 4 and 5 in force on assent 15.12.2011 but see ss. 46 and 56 for application of Part 4 (ss. 46 to 55) and Part 5 (ss. 56 to 64); Part 2 (ss. 14 to 40) and Part 3 (ss. 41 to 45) in force 01.08.2012 see SI/2011‑120 and s. 44
